article.title: "Early Warning" Generic Medium Designations in Multimedia Catalogues
article.author: Lewis, Peter R.
article.text: The much-favored "early warning" generic medium designation is discriminatory, functionally inefficient, and out of line with the national and international acceptance of AACR.. A specific designation, placed with the collation, is preferable on all these grounds; and there are better ways of giving an "early warning"..
